document_data.name: Hall of Vigilance
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of Vigilance''' was a temple of [[Helm]], within the city of [[Sundabar]], that possessed an imposing grandeur.
document_data.Geography: This temple was located on the west side of Sundabar, just within the [[Rivergate (Sundabar)|Rivergate]].
document_data.Activities: Suspicious individuals were often brought before the priests of this temple for questioning under the effects of a ''[[detect lie]]'' [[spell]].<ref>
document_data.Inhabitants: In the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Hall of Vigilance were governed by High Guardian [[Ruthard Fourl]].  In the late 14{{th}} century DR, he was succeeded by [[Mraskin Thoelaunth]].
